review_text: This laptop has a great screen but poor battery life.
The camera takes amazing photos even in low light.
The headphones are comfortable but sound quality is average.
The restaurant had excellent service but the food was mediocre.
The hotel room was clean but the wifi was slow.
The sneakers are durable but not very comfortable.
This phone has incredible battery life and fast charging.
The app interface is intuitive but it crashes frequently.
The restaurant's ambiance was great but service was slow.
This book has engaging characters but a predictable plot.
